import { Formik, Field, Form, ErrorMessage } from 'formik' import schema2 from './schema2' import '../Styles/modal/modal.css' import '../Styles/modal/modalDoar.css' import Swal from 'sweetalert2' const ModalFormDoar = ({ id='modal', onClose = () => {}, Children}) => { const handleOutsideClick = (e) => { if(e.target.id === id) onClose(); } function onSubmit(values,{ setSubmitting, resetForm }){ console.log(values) Swal.fire({ position: 'center', icon: 'success', title: 'Tudo certo!', text: 'Em breve entraremos contato.', showConfirmButton: false, timer: 2000 }) setSubmitting(false) resetForm({ values: '' }) onClose() } return(
{({isSubmitting}) => (

Preencha o formul√°rio

)}
{Children}
) } export default ModalFormDoar
